inclusion.criterion: Histologically or cytologically confirmed squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Metastatic or locally recurrent carcinoma of the head and neck that is considered incurable by local therapies
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any number of prior chemotherapy or biologic/targeted therapy regimens is allowed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No prior systemic EGFR inhibitors, such as ZD1839 (Iressa, gefitinib)/Iressa (AstraZeneca)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have either: Strata A: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) 2
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior therapy with docetaxel at any time (even if part of prior curative treatment)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Unstable systemic disease, including active infection, uncontrolled hypertension, unstable angina, congestive heart failure, or serious arrhythmia requiring medication
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has received XRT. However, they have a history of prior chemotherapy with docetaxel, which is an exclusion criterion.
